name: Cube League
description:
Cube League is a very intriguing and adventurous indie game with high-powered octane momenta. 

This is a very simple game and for mobile users, it contains 15 levels and multiple immersive soundtracks. You can unlock different player colors using diamonds which you can earn by working on the levels,  You can produce great slow-mo's to finish the level easily. Upgrades to slow-mo's are also possible in the upgrades panel. You can edit the player difficulty in the settings panel and can beat the last level in hard mode to become a pro champion.

It was first uploaded to the Google Play store but was for some reason is no longer available. 

Credits - 

Programming & designing - Rishi Ahuja

Background scoring - Vansh Kath

Inspired by - Brackeys
